entry.value: select t.AMOUNT SUMM, t.dt_date DT, 'Амра' N from AMRA_STMT_CALC_ROW t where DT_DATE = ? and regexp_like(t.purposeofpayment, '[0-9]{2}.[0-9]{2}.[0-9]{4}') and t.amount in (select ST_SUM from table(z_sb_create_tr_amra.STMT_CHECK(?))) union all select trn.MTRNRSUM SUMM, trunc(trn.DTRNCREATE) DT, 'Сбер' N from Z_SB_POSTDOC_AMRA_DBT pdoc, trn where pdoc.kindpayment = trn.ITRNNUM and exists (select null from table(lob2table.separatedcolumns(pdoc.paymentnumbers, /* the data LOB */ chr(10), /* row separator */ ';', /* column separator */ '' /* delimiter (optional) */)) where COLUMN1 in (select tr.checknumber from Z_SB_TRANSACT_AMRA_DBT tr where trunc(tr.paydate) = ?)) and pdoc.sess_id in (select tr.sess_id from Z_SB_TRANSACT_AMRA_DBT tr where trunc(tr.paydate) = ? group by sess_id) and trunc(pdoc.date_document) = ? and (trn.CTRNACCD = '30110810100000000003' or trn.CTRNACCC = '30110810100000000003') and trn.MTRNRSUM in (select ST_SUM from table(z_sb_create_tr_amra.STMT_CHECK(?)))
